Experiment Method.Assay Method: Allelic Expression Analysis and Epigenetic Analysis

Material used.Material Name: Lymphoblastoid cell line and blood cells from a patient heterozygous for p.Ala53Thr
Material used.Description: The study used a lymphoblastoid cell line and blood cells from a patient heterozygous for the p.Ala53Thr mutation in SNCA.

Readout description.Conclusion: Abnormal allelic expression and epigenetic silencing
Readout description.Molecular Effect: Epigenetic silencing (histone modifications) leading to reduced mRNA expression of the mutant allele
Readout description.Result Description: The mutant allele (p.Ala53Thr) showed reduced mRNA expression compared to the wild-type allele, with epigenetic silencing involving histone modifications.

Biological replicates.Description: The study focused on a single patient; biological replicates are not explicitly mentioned.

Technical replicates.Description: Technical replicates are not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Control individuals with two normal SNCA alleles were used as positive controls for comparison.

Basic negative control.Description: No explicit negative control is described in the literature.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal allelic expression with no significant difference in mRNA levels between alleles

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Reduced mRNA expression of the mutant allele compared to wild-type alleles
